12‑Week Leadership Curriculum

·

Weeks 1–2 — Groundwork

  • Habits, time, expectations. Read: Influence Without a Title.

Weeks 3–6 — Execution

  • Planning, meetings, decision logs. Run: 30‑Minute Meeting.

Weeks 7–12 — Leading

  • Small project end‑to‑end. Retro, next plan.

Get one practical leadership lesson each week

Short. Applicable. No hype.
